segments.text: This is our Submission of Tender which includes the information about volume of the project , the cost and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of guarantee are you going to provide for us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can provide you with standby letter of credit established by Bank of China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you are supposed to pay it on time . If you don't furnish a tender bond on time , your tender will not be considered . Besides , you also should provide derailed engineering of the good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do we submit the tender ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To our office which is on the third floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . By the way , is tender-opening done publicly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . All the bidders will be invited to join us to supervise the tender-opening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And are the prices stated in the US dollar ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , so far as we know , in the field , your company has lots of experience and we hope you will consider the tender seriously .
segments.speaker: S2
